name: p4-root
description: P4 Game - Root package with backend and frontend subrepos

scripts.install:all: npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend
scripts.build:all: npm run build --prefix backend && npm run build --prefix frontend
scripts.dev: echo 'Run npm run dev:backend and npm run dev:frontend in separate terminals'
scripts.start: echo 'Run npm run start:backend and npm run start:frontend in separate terminals'
